thread.title: Marion Cotillard Welcomes Her Second Child
thread.title_full: Marion Cotillard Welcomes Her Second Child

title: Marion Cotillard Welcomes Her Second Child
text: Marion Cotillard Welcomes Her Second Child Getty By Alyssa Bailey Mar 17, 2017 Marion Cotillard has given birth to a daughter, her rep confirmed to People . It's the second child for Cotillard and her partner Guillaume Canet, who also have a five-and-a-half old son together. The two started dating in 2007 . Cotillard announced her pregnancy—and shut down tabloid rumors about her and Allied costar Brad Pitt, who had just separated from Angelina Jolie—on Instagram in September: Advertisement - Continue Reading Below A post shared by @marioncotillard on Sep 21, 2016 at 4:43pm PDT More from ELLE:
